Verses: 1 seeyonin Siraiyiruppaik Karththar Thiruppumbodhu, Soppanam Kaangiravargalpol Irundhom.

2 appozhudhu Nammudaiya Vaai Nagaippinaalum, Nammudaiya Naavu Aanandha Saththaththinaalum Niraindhirundhadhu; Appozhudhu: Karththar Ivargalukkup Periya Kaariyangalaich Seydhaar Endru Purajaadhigalukkulle Sollikkondaargal.
3 karththar Namakkup Periya Kaariyangalaich Seydhaar; Idhinimiththam Naam Magizhndhirukkirom.
4 karththaave, Therkaththi Vellangalaith Thiruppuvadhupola, Engal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppum.
6 alliththoovum Vidhaiyaich Sumakkiravan Azhudhukondu Pogiraan; Aanaalum Thaan Aruththa Arigalaich Sumandhukondu Gempeeraththode Thirumbivaruvaan.
